methods.name: public static AssetManager initSystem()
methods.comment:
* This initializes the static field {@link AssetManager#sSystem} which is used
     * by methods who get a global asset manager using {@link AssetManager#getSystem()}.
     * <p/>
     * They will end up using our bridge asset manager.
     * <p/>
     * {@link Bridge} calls this method after setting up a new bridge.

methods.name: public static void clearSystem()
methods.comment:
* Clears the static {@link AssetManager#sSystem} to make sure we don't leave objects
     * around that would prevent us from unloading the library.

methods.name: public InputStream open(String fileName, int accessMode) throws IOException
public InputStream openNonAsset(int cookie, String fileName, int accessMode) throws IOException
